document.full_text: new jersey governor chris christie is often mentioned as a presidential contender, but fewer than one in four voters in his home state would back him as a candidate, a poll released on thursday said.
document.title: nj voters don't want governor christie for president
lines_and_colors: new jersey governor chris christie is often mentioned as a presidential contender, but fewer than one in four voters in his home state would back him as a candidate, a poll released on thursday said.
